reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, well-made, and comfortable, with flattering design that works particularly well for hourglass and inverted triangle body shapes.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, beautiful dress
items.body: Beautiful dress which I received so many compliments. It is so comfortable and fits well. I am 5‚Äô 2‚Äù, 145 pounds and small fit perfect. I love this dress so much, I ordered another one in navy blue. Read more
items.author: Melanie Kurtz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and vibrant
items.body: This dess was comfy and a lil bit sexy. Although a little older, I felt young and vibrant in it for my Wing Christmas party. Read more
items.author: Seana O'Kelley-Hooker

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress, But Not Petite-Friendly
items.body: Strapless ruched dress is really cute and the material feels soft and comfy. It‚Äôs great for summer events or vacations, and the floral print and split design make it look stylish and flattering. But if you‚Äôre on the shorter side, like me, the fit isn‚Äôt ideal. The dress runs a bit long and the top doesn‚Äôt sit quite right‚Äîit felt loose and needed adjusting to stay up. Even the smallest size was a bit too roomy, especially around the bust and waist. It‚Äôs a nice dress overall, just not the best choice for petite women unless you‚Äôre okay with tailoring or styling it differently. Read more
items.author: Courtney Sanders

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: I was scent I al at first with this but once I put it on I had a whole different mind set. The quality is great, the fabrics is a silky stretch material and is very lightweight. It fits true to size and it‚Äôs tight where it needs to be and loos where it needs to be as well. The dress was all around a good fit and good for what I wanted it for. Read more
items.author: branbabe987

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The dress was beautiful. Flattering and it's perfect for both elegant or casual
items.body: Update-- I contact Customer service they located the items admitted it was their mistake ///The dress itself was wonderful. It was just ordered too big. I ordered it in a medium and we turned the large. However, Amazon claims they did not receive it. They received everything else in the package. This is very frustrating. I will find the tracking number. Read more
items.author: Beth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hubby approved!
items.body: I knew this dress was a winner when I tried it on and my husband's eyes bugged out of his head.ü§£ It's super comfy, stretchy, (not too stretchy), and hugs in all the right places. It also has a short skirt attached inside, so no embarrassing windy "free shows." LOL! The center drape isn't too heavy which I was worried about. I'm 5'3", 140 lbs, 56 yrs. old and got the Medium which fit perfect! The top part stays put because it has a thin, clear strip that slightly grips. The Flora Green is stunning and perfect for a beach wedding. Needs a little steaming to unwrinkle, but washed beautifully (hang-dryed). Will order another color. Thank you! Read more
items.author: ThaiGirLillie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous dress for a Polynesian luau
items.body: Beautiful dress received many compliments on it. I'm 5'9"" 185lbs 36ddd and wore a small because the material is very stretchy. I first ordered the medium and large but returned then because they were way too big. So order down! I wore a nude strapless shapewear underneath for support because it is a bit see through. It was very comfortable and material moves with you. Read more
items.author: Kerri

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Night out
items.body: Great fit and super comfy!! Easy to pack, and doesn‚Äôt wrinkle Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Ruched Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Ruched Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Colorful Flowers, Black, Beige Flowers, Bright Rose, Brown Leopard, Rose Flora, Blue Flower, Black Leopard, Lemon Yellow, Bright Orange#3, Flora Green, Flora Sea Blue, Royal Blue, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
